text.text: 1: This area is where you see the materials in the side tanks, more tanks equals more spots for materials.
2: This is the area where your alloyed materials will show once they are finished working their magic.
3: This area is where your fuel shows. Hotter fuels means you can melt more things.
In both 1 and 3, left clicking with a fluid item will attempt to fill the item from the tank, while right clicking will attempt to dump the item into the tank.
